item.title: Haskell 常用函数笔记
item.description:
运算符函数

(!!) 取第n个元素
Prelude> :t (!!)
(!!) :: [a] -> Int -> a

Prelude> [0,1,2,3,4]!!3
3
Prelude> [0,1,2,3,4]!!0
0
乘方 (^), (^^),(**)
Prelude> :t (^)
(^) :: (Integral b, Num a) => a -> b -> a
Prelude> 54.5^5
4.8081998590625e8

Prelude> :t (^^)
(^^) :: (Fractional a, Integral b) => a -> b -> a
Prelude> 5.6^^6
30840.979455999986

Prelude> :t (**)
(**) :: Floating a => a -> a -> a
Prelude> 0.2**0.1
0.8513399225207846
